department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
full_summary:
### Omnibus Market Value Study Report Request for Proposal

#### Project Summary
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites qualified Suppliers to submit a proposal for an Omnibus Market Value Study Report related to the VIA High Frequency Rail project. The report will serve as a benchmarking tool and internal reference for the project's pre-production phase.

#### Important Dates
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 16, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024

#### Eligibility
This requirement is open to the holders of the Supply Arrangement EP021-192296 Professional Services. The following Suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Altus Group Limited
* CBRE Limited
* Colliers International
* Cushman & Wakefield, ULC

#### Security Requirements
None.

#### Selection Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

#### Description of the Requirement
The VIA High Frequency Rail project aims to connect Quebec City to Toronto with a high-frequency railway. PSPC has been mandated to source the necessary expertise for producing an Omnibus Market Value Study Report for land value. The report will be used as a benchmarking tool and for internal purposes throughout the pre-production phase of the project.

**Contact Information**

* Marie-Ève Bouchard, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: [marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice and Documents**

Please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time, which have been adjusted accordingly. The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on January 16, 2024.

All bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive. 

Please visit the Ariba Discovery website for additional information: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18272038?extsite=MTgyNzIwMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

*Note: This tender is closed*
